name: ARRI Alexa Mini LF Camera Body
description: Flagship large-format digital cinema camera renowned for its superior image quality, dynamic range, and reliability in professional film productions.

name: Sony FX9 Full-Frame Cinema Camera
description: Professional 6K full-frame camera designed for broadcast and cinematic applications with electronic variable ND filter.

name: Blackmagic URSA Broadcast G2
description: Versatile studio and field camera with 6G-SDI and 12G-SDI connectivity for live production and ENG.

name: Zeiss Supreme Prime 50mm T1.5
description: High-end cine prime lens delivering exceptional sharpness, minimal distortion, and beautiful bokeh for large-format sensors.

name: Canon CN-E 24-70mm T2.8 L F
description: Servo zoom cine lens with consistent T2.8 aperture, ideal for broadcast and documentary work.

name: ARRI SkyPanel S60-C LED Softlight
description: Versatile RGBW LED panel for precise color control and soft illumination in studio and location shoots.

name: Aputure Nova P300c RGBWW LED
description: Powerful panel light with full color gamut for creative lighting designs in film and events.

name: Sennheiser MKH 50 Supercardioid Mic
description: Compact shotgun microphone with pristine sound capture for dialogue in challenging acoustic environments.

name: Zoom F8n Multi-Track Recorder
description: 8-input field recorder with 32-bit float recording for professional audio post-production.

name: DJI Ronin 2 Pro Gimbal Stabilizer
description: Professional 3-axis gimbal for heavy cinema rigs, enabling smooth tracking shots.

name: DJI Matrice 300 RTK Drone
description: Enterprise drone platform with advanced obstacle avoidance for aerial cinematography.

name: Manfrotto 504X Fluid Head Tripod
description: Professional video tripod with fluid drag system for precise pan and tilt control.

name: Matthews Century C+ Stand Kit
description: Versatile century stand for mounting lights, flags, and accessories on set.

name: SmallHD Indie 7 Monitor
description: Bright 7-inch HDR monitor with touchscreen interface for on-set monitoring.

name: Teradek Bolt 4K Wireless Video
description: Zero-delay wireless transmission system for 4K video up to 1500ft range.

name: Anton Bauer Titon 240 V-Mount Battery

name: SanDisk 1TB Extreme PRO CFexpress Card
